items.summary: Update the User dashboard homepage layout to match the uploaded reference image (IMG_20260206_123940-2.jpg): keep the same colors/icons/logo style, but wrap the three KPI cards (Total Due, Total Work, Total Taken) inside a single shared bordered container, while preserving the KPI values and calculations.

Update the User dashboard homepage action tiles to match the uploaded reference image layout and styling: display Production, Work, and Nasta tiles in one row (3 columns), and display Payment/Loan as a single tile on the next row aligned to the left; ensure each tile has a clear rounded border and shadow consistent with the reference, without changing what each tile does.

Update the Admin dashboard homepage to use the same design language as the User homepage and the uploaded reference image: the top totals area should use the same KPI layout (1 full-width card + 2 half-width cards) and those three KPI cards must also be wrapped inside a single shared bordered container; keep the same totals and computations currently shown in admin summary.

Reorganize and style the Admin dashboard homepage menu tiles so that sections are visually grouped and ordered with bordered/rounded group containers consistent with the reference style: group money-related actions together, group work-related actions together, and group settings-related actions together; do not add any new screens and do not change what any tile navigates to.

Ensure the overall screen/frame border and per-section borders are consistent across both User and Admin homepages (including a clear outer screen border and per-group borders), matching the reference imageâ€™s emphasis on bordered sections, while keeping all existing functionality intact.
